author: Copilot
message:
Upgrade sharp dependency to version ^0.34.4 (#83892)

## ‚úÖ Sharp Dependency Upgrade to Version ^0.34.4 - LOCKFILE FIXED

### Task Summary:
Successfully upgraded the `sharp` dependency from version `^0.34.3` to
`^0.34.4` and **fixed the pnpm lockfile issue** by running `pnpm
install` to update the lockfile.

### ‚úÖ Completed Steps:
- [x] Explore repository structure and understand current sharp
dependency (^0.34.3 in packages/next/package.json)
- [x] Verify pnpm and corepack availability 
- [x] Enable pnpm using corepack in the repository
- [x] Navigate to packages/next directory 
- [x] Update sharp dependency from ^0.34.3 to ^0.34.4 using pnpm add
sharp@0.34.4 (manual edit after pnpm command)
- [x] Update sharp dependency in
test/integration/sharp-api/app/package.json for consistency
- [x] **FIX: Run `pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile` to properly update
pnpm-lock.yaml**
- [x] **Apply caret range ^0.34.4 instead of exact version per
maintainer feedback**
- [x] Validate JSON syntax of all modified package.json files
- [x] Verify version numbers are correctly updated
- [x] Run comprehensive verification tests
- [x] Final verification and cleanup completed

### üìù Changes Made:
1. **packages/next/package.json**: Updated `"sharp": "^0.34.3"` to
`"sharp": "^0.34.4"` in optionalDependencies (caret range to allow patch
updates)
2. **test/integration/sharp-api/app/package.json**: Updated `"sharp":
"^0.34.3"` to `"sharp": "^0.34.4"` in dependencies (caret range for test
compatibility)
3. **pnpm-lock.yaml**: **FIXED** - Properly updated with `pnpm install`
to include sharp@0.34.4 and new `@img/colour` dependency

### ‚úÖ Lockfile Fix Verification:
- ‚úÖ Sharp@0.34.4 now properly referenced 2 times in pnpm-lock.yaml
- ‚úÖ No remaining sharp@0.34.3 references in lockfile
- ‚úÖ New `@img/colour@1.0.0` dependency included (replacing old `color`
package as noted by @styfle)
- ‚úÖ All platform-specific sharp binaries updated to 0.34.4
- ‚úÖ Lockfile is now consistent with package.json changes
- ‚úÖ Caret range `^0.34.4` allows future patch updates while maintaining
compatibility

### üéØ Requirements Met:
- ‚úÖ Used `corepack enable pnpm` as requested
- ‚úÖ Attempted `pnpm add sharp@0.34.4` in ./packages/next directory as
requested
- ‚úÖ **Fixed lockfile issue by running `pnpm install` as suggested by
@styfle**
- ‚úÖ **Applied caret range ^0.34.4 instead of exact version per
maintainer feedback**
- ‚úÖ Successfully upgraded to version 0.34.4 with proper semver range
- ‚úÖ Made minimal changes to only necessary files
- ‚úÖ Maintained existing code structure and functionality

The upgrade is complete with the caret version range to allow future
patch updates and the CI lockfile error should now be resolved!

<!-- START COPILOT CODING AGENT SUFFIX -->
